sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>To populate 'Rate in functional currency' field on 'Rate Line' (rate_model_line) records.</description> <name>PopulateRateInFunctionalCurrField</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var start = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Starting of populateRateInFuncCurr , time : "+start); var upgradeHelper = new RateModelUpgradeHelper(); upgradeHelper.populateRateInFuncCurr(); var end = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Ending of populateRateInFuncCurr , time : "+end); gs.log("Total time taken for populateRateInFuncCurr in millisecs : "+(end.getNumericValue() - start.getNumericValue()));]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-19 07:39:43</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d9e632c60b9310102b0bed3ab4673a22</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>PopulateRateInFunctionalCurrField</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Rate Model" source="com.snc.rate_model">49209e6b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4349</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d9e632c60b9310102b0bed3ab4673a22</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-28 03:17:39</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
